actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to transfer the Community Development Credit Union Revolving Loan Fund to the National Credit Union Administration Board to administer the Fund.
short_title: Community Development Credit Union Revolving Loan Fund Transfer Act
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Community Development Credit Union Revolving Loan Fund Transfer Act - Transfers the authority to administer the Community Development Credit Union Revolving Loan Fund from the Secretary of Health and Human Services to the National Credit Union Administration.

titles.title: Community Development Credit Union Revolving Loan Fund Transfer Act
A bill to transfer the Community Development Credit Union Revolving Loan Fund to the National Credit Union Administration Board to administer the Fund.
